T

textColor - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Derived from the Color class (ex Color#RED), this is the color of the text views.
textListener - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
Respond to text (ex subtitle or closed captioning) events.
timeFormat - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Encodes the HH:MM:SS or MM:SS time format.
timeFormatter - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Formats times to HH:MM:SS or MM:SS form.
title - Variable in class com.google.googlemediaframeworkdemo.demo.MainActivity.VideoListItem
The title of the video.
togglePlayPause() - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
If the player is paused, play it and if the player is playing, pause it.
topChrome - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Contains the logo, video title, and other actions button.
trackNames - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The names of the available tracks, indexed by DemoPlayer INDEX_* constants.
trackStateForType - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The state of a track at a given index (one of the TYPE_* constants).
TYPE_AUDIO - Static variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The element at index TYPE_AUDIO is an audio type renderer.
TYPE_DEBUG - Static variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The element at index TYPE_DEBUG is a debug type renderer.
TYPE_TEXT - Static variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The element at index TYPE_TEXT is a text type renderer.
TYPE_VIDEO - Static variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper
The element at index TYPE_VIDEO is a video type renderer.
